snippet.title: [x68000] Direct X - Longplay
snippet.description:
Direct X is a doujin shoot'em up for the sharp x68000 developed by PXY in 1998.
This is a nice shooter with  3D graphical elements and awesome musics.
There are no powerups and unfortunately the game has only 3 levels (2 levels and a final boss).
Credits go to Superdeadite for sharing this little gem with the community, thank you very very much!
